value.name: Four years after Megxit, the Sussexes say everything is rosy across the pond - but as figures show their Archewell Foundation is low on donations, critics beg to differ
value.description: Judging by the slick, minute-long video released this month by the Duke and Duchess of Sussex 's Archewell Foundation, the past year has been nothing short of a triumph.

value.name: The key stand out sign Meghan Markle's royal days are firmly behind her
value.description: Meghan Markle has kept a fairly low profile since stepping down as a senior royal at the start of 2020, but according to one subtle sign, the former actress appears to have "never been happier". The one clue to how Meghan - who was recently met with a dig ...

value.name: Selena Gomez's 'super cozy' Everlane sweater is 30% off for Boxing Day
value.description: In late 2022, Gomez posted an Instagram Story wearing the half-zip sweater in a (since-discontinued) shade of blue. In the post, the "Only Murders in the Building" actress looked as cozy as can be in the merino knit, which she styled with a pair of Jenny Bird earrings and an "I Voted" sticker.

value.name: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Jet to Tropical Holiday Vacation with Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet
value.description: Meghan, 42, and Harry, 39, have squeezed in a few private vacations this year. In September, the couple reportedly stopped in Portugal (where Harry’s cousin Princess Eugenie and her family live part-time) after the 2023 Invictus Games in Germany and quietly visited the Caribbean in October after marking World Mental Health Day in New York City.

value.description: A royal expert has weighed in on the Duchess of Sussex supposed strategy for her 'own brand'. An expert has weighed in on Meghan Markle's apparent ploy to distance herself from husband Harry - and it may be about to pay off.

value.description: They were spotted with Lili and Archie in Zapotal, Nandayure, and Guanacaste.

value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are reportedly hoping 2024 will be their “year of redemption”, as they’re considering a big move to Los Angeles.

value.description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex had been trying to keep their heads down and focus on rebranding their image when Omid Scobie released Endgame and opened a fresh new royal feud.

value.name: Meghan Markle's creamy Christmas cocktail might be the healthiest royal tipple yet
value.description: There are benefits in the recipe's supporting ingredients. Cinnamon has antioxidant and anti-viral properties, can reduce inflammation, helps decrease blood pressure, and promotes healthy blood sugar levels. Meanwhile, cardamom aids digestion and acts as a stimulant to improve circulation, and ginger and dates are famous for aiding gut health.

value.name: King Charles gives 'bizarre' Christmas gift to staff which he slips into their lockers
value.description: According to one of King Charles III's former employees, the monarch likes to give his staff quirky presents during the festive season. Grant Harrold, who worked as a butler at Highgrove for seven years, told The Mirror about the interesting gifts he had received from the King.

value.name: King Charles' thoughts on not spending 'hectic' Christmas with grandchildren Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet
value.description: During a chat with HELLO!, Ingrid Seward, royal author and editor-in-chief of Majesty Magazine, confessed that the King may be "relieved" not to spend Christmas with Prince Harry and his family as the day tends to be pretty "hectic" and he won't be able to give his full attention to them.

value.name: Logan Paul has very extra response to South Park’s savage Prime spoof
value.description: Logan Paul has tried to get his own back on South Park after the show utterly destroyed him with their Prime energy drink spoof. In the latest episode of the long running show, the controversial YouTuber and current WWE United States Champion became their latest target in an absolutely savage parody.

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Seen on Vacation With Kids in Costa Rica
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle enjoyed some time vacationing in Costa Rica with their children, Archie and Lilibet, visiting Zapotal, Nandayure and Guanacaste.

value.name: Meghan Markle Makes Acting Cameo In Coffee Commercial
value.description: Meghan Markle has been a supporter of Clevr Blends since 2017 but was only announced as its investor in 2020. Shortly after, Kim Kardashian and Oprah Winfrey co-signed with the brand, which sells nutrition-rich lattes "filled with magical plants to manage stress."
